connector.description:
Update an object in Salesforce. 

The body received must contain a JSON key-value pair for each property to update, for example: `{ "Phone": "1234567890", "Name": "Antonia" }`

The body received must include the `sObjectName` and `sObjectId` properties.

camel.kamelet.salesforce-update-sink.sOb.name: camel.kamelet.salesforce-update-sink.sObjectName
camel.kamelet.salesforce-update-sink.sOb.description: The type of the Salesforce object. Required if using a key-value pair. Example: Contact

camel.kamelet.salesforce-update-sink.sOb.name: camel.kamelet.salesforce-update-sink.sObjectId
camel.kamelet.salesforce-update-sink.sOb.description: The ID of the Salesforce object. Required if using a key-value pair.
